## Time series

```{r utilities-ts}
ggplotly_ts <- function(data) {
  p <-
    data %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = year, y = y, color = gear_code)) +
    geom_line()
  ggplotly(p)
}
```

### Landings

```{r landings-plot}
read.taf("report/summary_of_totalwieight.csv") %>%
  ggplotly_ts()
```
